rules.ruleString: Incompatible with (I/W) {APG4544, APG4952, APG5946, APG5952, ATS2046, ATS2052, ATS3052, ATS4044}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3045}
For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3045}
(Must have passed a unit in {ATS3045} or  Permission required)
Incompatible with (I/W) {APG4544, APG4952, APG5946, APG5952, ATS2046, ATS2052, ATS3052, ATS4044}

unitName: From translation to interpreting in Chinese 2
description: This unit builds on and develops the bilingual communication skills acquired in ATS3045 Chinese interpreting skills 1, and on the ability to apply these skills in a wider range of contexts, including: finance and trade, banking and insurance, information and technology, legal matters, conference interpreting, and interview techniques.
